medical_history.chief_complaint: Congenital deformity of the lower lip with recurrent inflammation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms consist of a congenital deformity of the lower lip, which has been associated with recurrent inflammation. The patient presented with a history of saliva-like mucous secretion excreted through the orifices of the lower lip upon gentle compression.
medical_history.family_history: The patient had no family history of other craniofacial deformities.
